description: A spicy, chewy and meaty way to enjoy zucchini.
name: Burrito Zucchini Boats Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 medium zucchini, sliced in half, lengthways

recipeInstructions.text: Slice the zucchini in half lengthways and remove the flesh from the centre and set aside.
Bake the zucchini shells in the oven on a baking tray for 10 minutes.
Heat up a pan with the canola oil to a medium heat and fry the mince for 8 minutes or until browned.
Drain any excess liquid from the pan and add the onion, garlic and zucchini flesh and fry together for 3 minutes.
Add the chillies, passata, cumin and beans to the pan and cook all this for 6 more minutes while tossing.
Remove the zucchini boats from the oven and fill with the beef mix, top with parmesan and grill for 3 minutes before serving.
